answers.answer: Blood pressure was constantly over 140/90. Face,  hands and feet swelled, protien in urine. The littlest activity would make me dizzy, my heart felt like it was pounding out of my chest.
My feet & hands have  bn swelling  for  weeks, I've got headache, acid, generally  feel crap a friend  did my BP it was 146/90 going to go docs in morning  I think xx

It doesn't hurt,  just keep in mind that high blood pressure and swelling alone don't mean preeclampsia, but letting your drs know about your symptoms can let them test (they should be testing every appt anyways)
Think best b safe, thank u x

question: For those  who have or had pre eclampsia  what  was your  blood  pressure  and  other  symptoms  please?  X
title: pre eclampsia
